div.p: This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….).Value Set Definition:LOINC { { COMPONENT not containing the word "panel" STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {1} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, H&P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*} } UNION { COMPONENT not ( containing the word "panel" OR starting with "can pronounce" ) STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {2} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} SYSTEM = ^Patient }}
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….).Value Set Definition:LOINC { { COMPONENT not containing the word "panel" STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {1} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, H&P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*} } UNION { COMPONENT not ( containing the word "panel" OR starting with "can pronounce" ) STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {2} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} SYSTEM = ^Patient }}
